sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import styled from 'styled-components'; import * as FaIcons from 'react-icons/fa'; import * as AiIcons from 'react-icons/ai'; import * as GiIcons from 'react-icons/gi'; import * as BsIcons from 'react-icons/bs'; import { useInput } from '../Data/useInput'; import Image from '../MediaFiles/pevSmall.png' const Container = styled.div` >.request{ display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 2rem; } ` const ProfileImg = styled.img` height: 5rem; ` var vaccineRequest = []; var today = new Date(); var date = today.getDate() + '-' + (today.getMonth() + 1) + '-' + today.getFullYear(); function Request() { const [value, setValue] = useState(false); const { value: name, bind: bindName, reset: resetName } = useInput(''); const { value: number, bind: bindNumber, reset: resetNumber } = useInput(''); const { value: child, bind: bindChild, reset: resetChild } = useInput(''); function changeView() { return setValue(true); } const handleSubmit = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault(); vaccineRequest.push({ "itemName": name, "itemNumber": number, "itemNofChild": child, "currentStock": (number * 100) % 7 }); resetName(); resetNumber(); resetChild(); } return (

Request Vaccine



{value ?

Republic of Rwanda

Ministry of Health


PEV/EPI

Date: {date}

VACCINE ORDER FORM

{vaccineRequest.map(post => { return ( ) })}
Children vaccinated last month No. of doses in stock Quantity ordered in doses
{post.itemName} {post.itemNofChild} {post.currentStock} {post.itemNumber}
:
{vaccineRequest.length > 0 ?

List of items on request



{vaccineRequest.map(post => { return ( ) })}
Vaccine name Current Stock Requested Last month usage
{post.itemName} {post.currentStock} {post.itemNumber} {post.itemNofChild}

: ""}
}
) } export default Request
